I'm confused, are these your consignments?
Doesn't really sit well with me to promote your consignments on this page. Perhaps put them in the eBay section or no section at all.

Chris, yes, they are my lots on consignment.

Jason, I'm sorry that my promotion doesn't sit well with you; I'm just trying to get attention drawn to some of my lots. I'm very new to this forum and was unaware of the eBay/Auctions section.
